text: Yetiya sihamtara ocarata sihamtara raachulasakale sanmukhara paraa arau pichaphalara paraa ahi kaichila ye, ‘tomaloke ekamatra allahara bahirae ana karao ibadata nakaraiba’. Sihamte kaichila, ‘yadi amara pratipalake iccha karailehemtena tente arasye te'om phiraista aratirna karailehemtena. Eteke tomaloke yito lai praeraita haicha seya ami asbikara karao’
